subject: Create port-tools plugin group scaffold
description:
Create the `claude/port-tools/` directory structure following Agent Alchemy plugin conventions.

Directory structure:
```
claude/port-tools/
├── skills/
│   └── plugin-porter/
│       ├── SKILL.md          (placeholder - built in Phase 2)
│       └── references/
│           └── adapters/     (adapter files go here)
├── agents/
│   └── researcher.md         (placeholder - built separately)
└── hooks/                    (if needed)
```

Register the plugin group:
- Create or update `claude/.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` entry for `port-tools`
- Include plugin.json with name, version (0.1.0), description
- Follow existing plugin group patterns (see core-tools, dev-tools for reference)

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] `claude/port-tools/` directory exists with skills/, agents/, references/ subdirectories
- [ ] `plugin.json` created with correct metadata (name: "agent-alchemy-port-tools", version: "0.1.0")
- [ ] Plugin registered in marketplace.json
- [ ] `skills/plugin-porter/` directory created with references/adapters/ subdirectory

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Follows exact naming conventions of existing plugin groups
- [ ] Does not conflict with existing plugin group names

**Testing Requirements:**
• Manual: Verify directory structure matches existing plugin group patterns
• Manual: Verify plugin.json validates against VS Code extension schema

Source: internal/specs/plugin-porting-SPEC.md Section 7.1, 9.1
